features: 【Compatiblity】- This spin mop replace head, mop base and mop handle sets is for O-Cedar EasyWring Spin Mop.NOTE: 2pcs mop heads refills and base only compatible with 1-Tank system NOT for 2 Tank RinseClean system.But the Individual Mop Handle is Universal fit for both 1 and 2 tank ocedar spin mop system.

【Upgraded Durable Iron Mop Handle】- Adjustable Spin mop handle replacement is made with Sturdy Iron material,Compare to normal stainless mop handle,the iron mop stick is more solid that Never to Break and can lasting long time to use. Besides,the surface of the mop stick with baked Red paint process technology to ensure Anti-slip to hold when clean. With standard screw,this mop handle can also work with most of other brand’s spin mop & brooms.

【Quality Microfiber Mop Heads Refills】- Includes 2 packs mop heads replacements which made of 100% super absorbent microfiber . Effortlessly clean dirt and dust from hardwood, ceramic tile, laminate, marble, and glass.Durable and machine washable.

【Safe to Floor】- Spin mop head replacement features full refills,offer an effective safeguard against potential scratches. and protection to your floors.Usually to replace mop head every 3 months for best clean results. Multiple sets for versatile cleaning in different places.

【Valuable Ocedar Mop Heads/Handle/Base Sets】- Valued ocedar mop head refills replacements contains 2 microfiber rotated mop refills, 4-section mop handle that extends from 30" to 58" and 1 Ocedar mop head base. These Ocedar mop heads combo to replace your old ocedar mop and make your floor clean effortlessly and effectively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is hard to move from side to side, otherwise it is great.

reviews.reviewerName: This company is scamming people for only 1 pad. I will not buy from them again!!!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This mop fits my spin bucket perfectly. I definitely needed the extra mop heads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't Quite Fit, But Works
reviews.reviewText: This Univeral Mop Pad works really well. It sticks well to my mop head and does a great job of both regular mopping and cleaning up messes. It even gets the debris missed during sweeping. One drawback is that, although universal, it is a bit big on my mop head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just as good as the original one
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because my son snapped ours in half this mop replacement is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the bucket with the separate tank for dirty water, and the spinner- I really love- not touching the dirty mop head to wring it out. The original handle was not very sturdy and I ended up duct taping it in the extended position bc it contantly would not stay in position. This one is a bit better, but I am going to try a different brand mop head & handle bc I don't really like the way the light weight flimsiness of this and I really dont like that the different buckets have a different heads. I will see if a generic mop & head will spin in this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS mop head is much smaller
reviews.reviewText: Looking at the pictures, I thought that this set was an exact duplicate of the O'Cedar, only much cheaper -- but I was wrong. The mop head itself, and the fuzzy mops, are quite a bit smaller than the O'Cedar, but as it turns out, this has advantages: I can now reach the mop into places previously inaccessible to my standard O'Cedar! AND the important thing -- the handle DOES WORK with the original, larger mop heads! which is great, since that's what I bought it for -- to replace my O'Cedar mop handle that was co-opted for another use. SO -- different but on the whole, a bit better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Need a better stick
reviews.reviewText: The mop part is great but the stick is very loose and wiggly which makes it very hard to mop. I have to get a better stick
